about_the_game:
About the game:

This is an RPG game designed to push your mind beyond its comfort zone. You will be challenged in every way: logical thinking, strategy, patience, decision-making, and much more. If you're looking for a real challenge, you've come to the right place. However, if you're seeking something casual, this game might not be for you. There’s no "easy mode" here. Only determination and lots of ''Game Over''.

Valuable Tips:

  • No Potions in Shops: You won't find potions to heal HP in shops. The only way to get them is by exploring and discovering them on the maps. Use them wisely!

  • Save System: To save your game, look for a crystal. The first time you interact with it, the crystal will save your progress and fully heal you and your party. But beware: it heals only once! Use it strategically!

  • Don’t Rush to Finish the Game: Trying to complete the entire game in one go can be overwhelming. Its recommend taking it one chapter at a time. This way, you’ll enjoy solving puzzles and overcoming challenges without unnecessary stress.

  • Boss Loot: Each boss has a 50% chance to drop a special piece of equipment. 

  • Hidden Crystals: There are 19 hidden crystals throughout the game, which can be used as a trade item in specific locations. The exchanges include rewards like HP MAX boosts, money, and even a very rare item: the Save Menu. The Save Menu becomes available for trade every 4 crystals you trade, starting from the 0th trade. Anyway, try to collect all the crystals by the end of the game—it’s challenging, but absolutely rewarding!

  • Using the Save Menu: This item allows you to save your game anytime, anywhere. Use this item wisely, as it’s incredibly rare. Some puzzles can be tough, and the last save point might be far away. In such situations, the Save Menu can be a lifesaver. Save it for critical moments, like difficult puzzles or bosses located far from a regular save crystal. Don’t hesitate to use it when you need it most!

Game Story:

The Legend of Shiande tells the tale of a humble blacksmith who lived in a small village surrounded by an immense forest. One fateful day, strange events began to unfold: people and animals transformed into ferocious monsters, destroying everything and everyone who hadn’t succumbed to the curse.

Faced with this looming threat, an ancient and incredibly powerful wizard chooses Shiande for an impossible mission: to save the world from an incurable curse. Armed only with his courage, a sledgehammer, and the will to protect what remains, Shiande sets out on a journey that will one day be remembered as a legend.

The legend of Shiande! (That is, if you can make it happen.)

short_description: Are you bored and looking for a challenge? Here’s an RPG that will push your mind and take you out of your comfort zone! Logical thinking, strategy, and tough decisions will be tested. No "Easy Mode"—get ready for plenty of "Game Over" and put your determination to the test!
